title: This Pyke guy is cool...
body:
But can his opening skin be a goofy one? You never do that and this guy is laying it on thick with the whole 21st century horror film. 

Maybe a definitely not skin
Or Fisherman Pyke

replies.body:
Sad trumpet noise. 

In other news: Candy King Ivern is my favorite launch skin on a champ I've worked on.

> [{quoted}](name=Pika Fox,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=opiZx2Ra,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-05-10T18:17:37.995+0000)
>
> Did you forget about Ivern?

It's a fair point. I might argue, however, the the relative goofiness of his opening skin was perhaps smaller than it is for most champs and their goofy skin. Maokai is a miserable crab apple, but that Meowkai...sweet baby J is that a crowd pleaser. 

"EAT MY ROVING RAINBOW ROOTS, NEWBS"

> [{quoted}](name=BeanMeDaddy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=opiZx2Ra,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-05-10T17:54:04.865+0000)
>
> how about no

Thank you for your mean-spirited and non-contributory comment.
What he need is a "elegant Piltover assassin" skin.
Thanks, now you've gone and gotten my hopes up!
No. That's extremely lame. He needs a cool one.

> [{quoted}](name=Demonblade Talon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=opiZx2Ra,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-05-10T18:47:41.762+0000)
>
> No. That's extremely lame. He needs a cool one.

I don't suppose you have any thoughts.
I would love a hilarious skin to go along with his creepiness. Maybe not as a release skin though
